# Learning objectives

At the end of this lesson, students will ...

- Create plots of model results.
- Create tables of model results.

# Plots and tables

Throughout these lessons, we've seen some graphs and tables of model results. In this lesson, we'll go into a little more depth about how to make some of these plots in a way that you can present in presentations and manuscripts.
